title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 116.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 116.9 - Severability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part are severable. If any provision
of this Part is found to be invalid, or if any application of this Part to any
person or circumstance is found to be invalid, the invalidity shall not affect
any other provisions or applications which can be given effect without the
invalid provision or application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
116.9

Adopted

New

York State Register August 3, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 31, eff. 8/3/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
